attributes.action: ensure that English students studying in Wales are not at a financial disadvantage when compared to Welsh students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is common knowledge that from 2007, all students in the UK will pay the so-called "top-up" fees of £3000 to the university at which they are studying. However, the Welsh National Assembly is offering reimbursment of £1800 to Welsh students studying in Wales, effectively creating a two-tier system and offering Welsh students a much lower financial burden for their degree.

Will the Prime Minister pledge to address this urgent situation and ensure that a two-tier situation for students will not be created?
